TEXT.TITLE: DALTEX <DLTX> GETS RESEARCH GRANT FOR SCANNER
TEXT.BODY: Daltex Medical Sciences Inc said it received a grant from the National Cancer Institute to develop a commercial ultrasound mammography system. The award is valued at 48,394 dlrs. Reuter
